description: Introduction to marketing management; consumer behaviour; marketing research and segmentation; product life cycle theory; product and pricing strategies; distribution and logistics; promotional strategy including advertising and personal selling; marketing organisation, planning and control; international marketing, services marketing and marketing for not-for-profit organisations.
restricted:
Restricted to students in the GCBusLead program. 
Quota: minimum of 10 enrolments. UQ reserves the right to limit the number of participants from any one organisation.
